description:
In this course ' Learn how to defeat your competitors in sales using NLP techniques ' by Pradeep Aggarwal teaches you emotional anchoring techniques on how to gain advantage over your competitor in sales and marketing field. This course contains anchoring and mind trigger techniques to give you the competitive edge over your competitors in the market .

This course is also useful for students to gain competitive edge in their daily schedule

This course contains 30 minutes of content and 9 lectures designed using video clips

This course includes-

Introduction

What is anchoring?

How to use anchoring for your benefit

How to avoid negative anchoring

Bonus exercise on emotional anchoring

Mental rehearsal using self hypnosis

How to use anchoring to build your confidence

Creating mind triggers to gain competitive advantage

Summary of the course
title: Learn How To Defeat Your Competitors In Sales Using NLP
